name: Agrestpunk
description:
Welcome to Agrestpunk! A game that mixes the steam-powered genre of Steampunk with Cangaço, the brazillian version of american western.  We're in early develompent, please fell free to share with us any type of feedbacks

Gameplay

Explore cities, old factories, the wild arid fields as a with your trusty Grappling Pistol, a device capable of firing a grappling claw to Whip and Zip your way through the game. Search thought every corner, talk with the civilians, collect hidden lore and complete bounties

Roadmap

We just finished this demo for college. And we want to keep updating this game.  We're considering some changes to the mechanics and improviment in the art and story of the game, but we need your feedback to help us! Any critics and sugestions coment here or send us as message through our social medias below
